objects.text:
Premium Faux Leather Construction
Spacious Interior Single Compartment
Medium Size Perfect for Daily Use
Stylish Gold Hardware Accents

product_details.description: ALDO womens Durable handbag This spaciously stylish tote bag boasts ample storage space and shoulder strap for extra utility Made of synthetic materials 1 compartment: stylish and functional to store your cell phone, wallet, or any other essential you need near by Medium: the perfect medium sized handbag for everyday life Size: 10.9'' L x 4'' W x 12.4'' H (28cm x 10.5cm x 32cm) Fabric type - Faux Leather ** Origin - Imported ** Closure type - Zipper ** Lining - Synthetic ** Country of Origin - Cambodia **

banner_details:
The banner design presents a polished and minimalistic aesthetic centered around a premium tote bag. The layout uses a visually grounded background comprising layered, semi-transparent geometric shapes in warm beige and ivory tones, with flowing border accents that create an elegant frame. The text hierarchy is clear and structured: the "tagline" introduces the feel of the product with classic serif typography, followed by the bold and eye-catching "heading" using a modern sans-serif font in coppery brown. Below, the "description" gives functional highlights in a legible text block. The "price" is large and emphasis-grabbing, while the "cta" sits within a rounded rectangular button. The "product_image" is prominently placed and isolated to maintain focus. 

Color palette:
- Warm Ivory #F5EFE7
- Soft Brown #8B5A2B
- Copper Bronze #B87333
- Gold Accent #D0A984
- White #FFFFFF
product_color: The product image features a sophisticated leather handbag in a warm, muted camel brown (#A87456), giving it a timeless and elegant look. The texture subtly adds depth, while the hardware – including locks, keys, and chain accents – is in polished gold (#D4AF37), which adds a touch of luxury. The ALDO logo and studs also use this golden tone, seamlessly blending with the neutral base while highlighting the brand. These elements contrast just enough with the base color to stand out without overpowering the design. Suggested colors for an ad banner: Camel Brown (#A87456), Gold (#D4AF37), Cream White (#F6F1EB), and Charcoal Gray (#3F3F3F).
